word:
The people of God must strive to be one, as Christ is one with the Father. Each one may say, "That is just what we want," but each considers that his own course of action, his words, and reasoning are right, and without any need of modification. How can these be of the same mind and the same judgment? Let all seek to be of one mind, at the same time remembering that any 


           -119- 

one worker's judgment is not to be deferred to without question.
